attributes.action: reduce the age for a 'two tone' Airsoft gun to 14
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the age for a two tone (unrealistic) Airsoft gun to the age of 14 as not many people get to play Airsoft as the age requirements are too high and people are always complaining that the nation is fat when sports like this are destroyed because of age requirements! Airsoft also helps gun awareness for the people who play the sport!
